actions.description: The elf makes two Longsword or Radiant Ray attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 13 (2d10 + 2) slashing damage when used with two hands, plus 10 (3d6) radiant damage.
actions.name: Longsword

actions.description: 6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (4d10) radiant damage.
actions.name: Radiant Ray

specialTraits.description: The elf has advantage on saving throws it makes to avoid or end the charmed condition on itself, and magic can't put it to sleep.
specialTraits.name: Fey Ancestry
